name: Roasted Sweet Potato & Quinoa Salad
description: A meal salad? Stop right there—it’s going to be a yes for me. Hearty salads are a lifesaver for healthy eating as the weather cools down. Chickpeas and quinoa are plant-based, protein powerhouses, making this salad a complete meal.
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Dice sweet potatoes. Place in a bowl. Add chickpeas; toss with oil. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Arrange on pan.
Meanwhile, in Round Steamer, combine quinoa with water. Cover and microwave on high 12 min or until tender.
Combine cooked potatoes, chickpeas and quinoa with spinach in a large bowl. Toss with dressing. Top with feta.
tips: Season sweet potatoes and chickpeas with your favourite Epicure seasoning before roasting.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Dilly Honey Mustard Dressing Mix
summary: Sure to be a hit at your next get-together, this is one of those so-good-you-keep-making-it dressings that will have everyone asking for the recipe. Dairy-free yet super creamy, this one hits you with a whole lot of dill flavour, a touch of honey, and a slight tang from apple cider vinegar.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
